content.description: Crux start, good holds and good feet. Climb straight up and top out. Watch for spider webs.
content.protection: Toprope. Some good small trees to anchor to above the route, but bring some long webbing as the rope drag can be high.
content.location: Left end of the obvious cliff face that runs from the start of the trail up the hill. It will be the last flat face just before the end.

content.description: West facing rock, sunny in the evening. Some good granite. Dirty, but easy routes. Lots of potential for all sorts of climbing. Try not to draw attention to yourself as base security might not have an issue with you climbing, just be nice and they probably won't have an issue.    Routes can be set up with toprope or trad.
